name: Funny / Meme
description: Playful, humorous design with bold colors and fun typography

quote_pool: I love you more than pizza. And that's saying a lot.
You're the cheese to my macaroni.
We go together like copy and paste.
I love you even when I'm hungry.
Relationship status: Making everyone jealous since day one.
I like you even when I'm hangry. That's true love.
